metrics.name: Average Issue Closing Time
metrics.description: Average time from issue creation to its closing
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	IF (${jsm_issue_change_condition},
		(SELECT LAST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN (${jsm_system_change_closing_events}))
		-(${jsm_issue_create_date}),
		(SELECT LAST(end_time) WHERE event_name IN (${jsm_issue_closing_events}))
		-(${jsm_issue_create_date}))
	)

metrics.name: Average Resolution Time
metrics.description: Average time from issue creation to its resolution

metrics.name: Average Response Time
metrics.description: Average time from issue creation to its first response

metrics.name: Issue Reassignment Rate
metrics.description: Ratio of issue reassignments per case
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE (event_name = ${jsm_issue_assignment_events})) > 1
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Assignment Ratio
metrics.description: Percentage of cases containing at least one assignment event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name) 
			WHERE (event_name = ${jsm_issue_assignment_events})) >0)
/
COUNT (case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Change Priority Ratio
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with priority change
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name) 
			WHERE (event_name = ${jsm_change_priority_events})) > 0) 
/
COUNT (case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Issue Change Ratio
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name) 
			WHERE (event_name = ${jsm_change_events})) > 0)
/
COUNT(case_id)
*100

metrics.name: First call resolution ratio
metrics.description: Percentage of incidents that are resolved without any rework. Rework is defined as any case that contains the same event name more than once.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT event_name)) = (SELECT COUNT(event_name))
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
*100

metrics.name: High Priority Issue Ratio
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with high priority

metrics.name: Breached SLA Issue Ratio
metrics.description: Ratio of the started SLA's that eventually breached

variables.name: jsm_issue_assignment_events
variables.description: Events defining the assignment of an issue

variables.name: jsm_issue_closing_events
variables.description: Events defining the last activity of an issue

defaultValues.defaultValue: 'Issue status change: Closed', 'Issue status change: Done'

variables.name: jsm_system_change_closing_events
variables.description: Events defining the last activity of a system change

defaultValues.defaultValue: 'Issue status change: Canceled', 'Issue status change: Completed', 'Issue status change: Failed'

variables.name: jsm_change_priority_events
variables.description: Events defining that the priority has been changed

variables.name: jsm_high_priority_condition
variables.description: Condition defining cases with high priority, for example priority = High or Highest

variables.name: jsm_issue_change_condition
variables.description: Condition defining cases where the Issue Type indicated a System Change. These types of issues have different closing events

variables.name: jsm_issue_create_date
variables.description: Attribute defining the creation of an issue

variables.name: jsm_first_response_date
variables.description: Attribute defining the first response date of an issue

variables.name: jsm_issue_resolution_date
variables.description: Attribute defining the resolution of an issue

variables.name: jsm_resolution_condition
variables.description: Condition defining the resolution of an issue

variables.name: jsm_open_condition
variables.description: Condition defining whether an issue is open

variables.name: jsm_close_condition
variables.description: Condition defining whether an issue is closed

variables.name: jsm_sla_breached
variables.description: Attribute defining the number of breached SLA

variables.name: jsm_sla_started
variables.description: Attribute defining the number of started SLA's
